mapper.select: select *, @rownum := @rownum + 1 As rownum from board, (select @rownum := 0) r order by board_num DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{id})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where board_num=#{board_num}
update board set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
